# Notes for: suppressPackageStartupMessages()
# [`suppressPackageStartupMessages()`]
[[`suppressPackageStartupMessages`]`(library(*package*))`]
+ Load a package without printing its greeting message.
```{r eval=FALSE}
suppressPackageStartupMessages(library(tidyverse))
```
+ This is very useful with the [`tidyverse`] and [`tidymodels`].  Use this if and only if you are also using the [`conflicted`] package (to avoid function name conflicts).
---
